mapper.insert: INSERT INTO home ( style_id, home_name, home_address, home_price, home_in_date,home_out_date, pictures_id, home_describe, home_spot, home_configure, landlord_id ) VALUES ( ( SELECT style_id FROM style WHERE style_name = #{styleName}),#{homeName},#{homeAddress},#{homePrice},#{homeInDate }, #{homeOutDate},#{picturesId},#{homeDescribe},#{homeSpot},#{homeConfigure}, ( SELECT landlord_id FROM landlord WHERE landlord_phone = #{landlordPhone}))
